attributes.action: Investigate the practises used by Radio1 to select winners for tickets for the Big Weekend
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to news reports regarding competitions 'fixing' conducted on several programmes related to the BBC we the undersigned request an investigation to be conducted in to competitions run by BBC Radio 1 for tickets to the Big Weekend 2007 in Preston. It could be possible the winners for tickets had already been selected whilst the Radio 1 encouraged listeners to continue trying. This must be investigated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
